loans.use: to buy more raw food such as cassava and sweet potatoes for resale.

loans.name: Judith's Group

texts.en:
Judith's group is comprised of four hard-working women. Judith is 22 years old and lives in the town of Kachwamba, in the Fortportal region of Uganda. She is single and has two children, one of them currently in school. For the past one year, Judith has been working hard to manage her small business, selling fast foods such as pancakes and vegetable sabusas. 

To help expand her business, Judith has requested a loan of 500,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. She will use the loan to buy more vegetables and wheat flour, which will be used for making sabusas. The loan will help Judith to generate greater profits and improve her stardand of living. Judith hopes that in the future, she will be able to build her own house. 

Judith is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities, and a forum for life-skills training.


"

loans.use: to buy more vegetables and wheat flour, which will be used for making sabusa.

loans.name: Enid

texts.en:
Enid is 46 years old and lives in the town of Fortportal in the Fortportal region of Uganda. She is married and has 4 children. For the past 19 years, Enid has been working hard to manage her small shop, which sells clothes. 

To help expand her business, Enid has requested a loan of 2,500,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more fashionable clothes that will be sold in the festive season, and will help Enid to generate greater profits and improve on her family's standard of living and pay for her medical bills. Enid hopes that in the future she will be able to expand her business into a big and well known whole sale shop in town. 

Enid is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP). The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Enid who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for micro-loans.

loans.use: to buy more fashionable clothes that will be sold in the festive season.

loans.name: Impactadoras Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “KULLAQUITAS”  iniciará el séptimo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Collpani, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Rosalia es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de ropa, venta de artefactos, chapería, elaboración de legía, producción y venta de videos, tejido de busos.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Rosalia es integrante, ella indica que hace dos años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una amiga que es socia de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de artefactos, negocio que aprendió a manejar por enseñanza de su cuñado.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de artefactos electrónicos) que adquirirá de la ciudad de Oruro o de la frontera Perú - Bolivia y posteriormente lo comercializará a pedido. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener en lo posible a su hogar pues ella vive en unión libre y tiene un hijo.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las capacitaciones del área de crédito y salud.
texts.en:
Kullaquitas Communal Bank will begin its seventh loan cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Collpani regional office.  It's made up of eight members and is governed by a board of directors of which Rosalia is the president.  The variety of business carried out by the members of the communal bank include clothing sales, electronics sales, auto body repair, bleach production, making and selling videos, and knitted sweaters.

The loan they're getting will benefit small business entrepreneurs like Rosalia.  She says she has been a member of Pro Mujer for two years, joining on the invitation of a friend who's a member of the institution.  Currently she has a business selling electronics, which she learned from her brother-in-law. 

The loan she's getting is to increase her capital to buy electronic devices, which she'll acquire in the city of Oruro or on the Peru-Bolivia border and later sell on order.  This form of work allows her to generate resources to support her household as much as possible, because she lives in a common-law relationship and has a child.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says she likes the loan and health trainings.

loans.use: to buy electronic devices

loans.name: Cira Del Socorro

texts.es:
Cira del Socorro a sus 60 años de edad es conocida en su comunidad como una mujer esforzada por sacar adelante a su familia. Toda su vida ha laborado en diferentes oficios que le han permitido adquirir experiencia para montar su propio negocio. Gracias a los ahorros que logró acumular mientras trabajó como empleada doméstica, pudo materializar su idea de negocio. Empezó vendiendo comidas como vendedora ambulante en las calles de su municipio. Posteriormente adecuó su negocio en un pequeño local que le alquilaron.

Su mayor deseo es poder mejorar su calidad de vida y comprar un local que le permita reducir los costos fijos. Sueña con poder ofrecerles a sus nietos mejores oportunidades de estudio debido a que por falta de recursos las limitaciones para acceder a una buena educación se hace cada vez más notorias. Por el deseo de salir adelante y obtener mejores oportunidades para su familia, Cira se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de productos de la canasta familiar con el fin de aumentar su capacidad de producción para la temporada de fin de año y poder generar mayores ganacias.
texts.en:
Cira del Socorro, age 60, is known in her community as a woman who works hard to get her family ahead.  She has worked all of her life in different fields that have allowed her to acquire experience to set up her own business.

Thanks to the savings that she managed to accumulate working as a domestic employee, she was able to put her idea about her business to work.  She started selling food in an itinerant manner on the streets of her municipality.  Later, she set up her business at a small rented place.

Her greatest wish is to be able to improve her quality of life and to buy a place that will allow her to reduce her fixed costs.  She dreams of being able to offer her grandchildren better educational opportunities.  The lack of resources to have access to a good education makes it increasingly important.  

Cira wants to get ahead and get better opportunities for her family.  That is why she is requesting a loan to buy basic food items.  She will do this in order to increase her production capacity for the end of the year season.  This way she will be able to generate greater income.

loans.use: to buy basic food products.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Greetings from Sierra Leone! This is 50-year-old Agnes from Moribatown Bo. She is married with three children between the ages of 16 years and 32 years.  One of her children is currently going to school. 

To earn a living, Agnes has worked as a seamstress for the past ten years. She sells different types of clothing material. She works at the business ten hours per day and six days per week. She has three relatives who are working with her at home.  Her other source of income comes from renting out a house. Agnes says that the main challenge to her business is inflation of price.

Agnes has requested a loan in order to buy different kinds of clothing material for resale. The extra income from this loan will allow her to increase her capital and improve her children’s welfare. 

In the future, she plans to expand her business to a tailoring institute. She thanks you for your support!

loans.use: to buy different kinds of clothing material for resale.

loans.name: Oretha

texts.en:
Oretha, 27, lives with her husband and three children at Buchanan. Her children are between the ages of 3 and 8 and are attending school. 

Oretha is a hardworking mother. She has been selling plates, rubber bowls, spoons, cups, and glasses for the past four years to assist her husband with the expenses of the family. She sells eleven hours a day and transports her goods by commercial vehicle to her business area. Some difficulty she faces is that she has fewer commodities. 

Oretha thanks the lenders for their support in her business. She has requested a loan to purchase more rubber dishes, spoons, and cups to increase her sales. Her plan for the future is to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more rubber dishes, spoons, and cups to increase her sales.

loans.name: Gregorio Manuel

texts.es: Gregorio de 69 años de edad es un claro ejemplo de que salir adelante es cuestión de ganas. Desde hace 12 años se dedica a la venta de dulces en las afueras de los colegios en su municipio. “Aunque esta actividad no me hace millonario, por lo menos calma el hambre en mi casa” con estas palabras don Gregorio manifiesta que su trabajo ha sido una bendición porque le ha permitido educar a sus hijos y llevar diariamente el alimento a su hogar. Su mayor sueño es poder montar una tienda bien surtida, para aumentar sus ingresos y poderle comprar a su familia la casa que tanto añoran. El es conciente que la única forma de lograrlo es trabajar arduamente, por ello no medita la hora de levantarse y comenzar con su faena. En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de confitería, mecatos y gaseosas, con el propósito de incrementar sus ventas y mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en: Gregorio, 69, is a clear example that moving forward is a question of will. For 12 years, he has worked selling sweets outside of the schools in his city. "Even though this work isn't making me a millionaire, at least it staves off hunger in my home." With these words, Gregorio declares that his work has been a blessing, because it has allowed him to educate his children and bring home food every day. His biggest dream is to be able to launch a well-stocked store in order to increase his income and buy his family the house that they long for. He knows that the only way to achieve this dream is to work hard. This is why he doesn't brood over when to get up and start his work. He is applying for the loan to buy sweets, pastries, and soft drinks, in order to increase his sales and improve his earnings.

loans.use: to buy sweets, pastries, and soft drinks.

loans.name: Gilberto

texts.es: Gilberto, tiene la edad de 45 años, está casado, vive con su esposa y sus hijas que son su mayor prioridad. El con el crédito pretende comprar los insumos para la asistencia de su cafetal, el comprara los abonos y productos para aplicarle a las plantas. El tiene una siembra que necesita mejorarla para esta próxima cosecha que se avecina poderle sacar el máximo de ganancias. El tiene como meta estabilizar su economía, para poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida  con mayores facilidades para el futuro. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Gilberto is 45 years old and married. He lives with his wife and his daughters, who are his greatest priority. With the loan, he plans to buy supplies to support his coffee plantings. He will buy the fertilizers and products to apply to the plants. He has a crop which he needs to improve so that he can get the maximum earnings out of the next harvest which is approaching. His goal is to stabilize his economic situation, so that he can give his family a better quality of life with a better outlook for the future. This is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR. He has not had other loans from state banks in the past, but FUDECOSUR provided the loan to him with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to improve his coffee crop.

loans.name: Seray

texts.en:
Seray, age 43, established her retail business in 1997. She lives in Moribatown Bo. She and her husband have raised three children, who are now between the ages of 15 and 26 years old. Two of her children are currently attending school. 

Seray began her business because her husband, an agriculturist, was not able to bring in enough of an income to support the home. Her business allows her to help support the family. She works at her business 10 hours per day, six days per week. She says that the main challenge to her business is transportation.

Seray is requesting a loan in order to buy general stock like soap, assorted drinks, and pure water. She is confident that the extra income from this loan will allow her to better support her family. 

In the future, Seray plans to expand her business to a higher level. 

She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy general stock like soap, assorted drinks, and pure water

loans.name: Benkadi Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe  Benkadi  est constitué de 5 femmes mariées et d’1 veuve qui ont  une moyenne d’âge de 30 ans et 3 enfants. Elles vivent la plupart dans des familles traditionnelles dans le quartier Massablacoura de la ville de Bougouni. 
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, d’amitié et de commerce. Pour renforcer leur capacité financière afin de mieux faire leur commerce, elles ont adhéré à l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso avec laquelle elles sont à leur deuxième  prêt. Ce groupe de femmes fait le commerce de céréales, de cosmétiques, de bois de chauffe, de chaussures, d’habits et des articles divers. 
N’tenin, qui est le membre du groupe papier en main, l’achat vente de d’habits.  Elle compte acheter avec son  prêt, 15 pièces de pagnes de différentes sortes avec les grossistes de Bougouni. Elle effectue ses ventes au marché  et à domicile, en détail au comptant et à crédit  à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Elle  envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 30.000FCFA qui sera  investi dans les activités et rembourser le prêt.
texts.en:
The group Benkadi comprises five married women and one widow. They average 30 years of age and three children each and live for the most part in traditional families in the Massablacoura district in Bougouni City. They know one another through ties of community, friendship, and commerce. To bolster their financial capacity, so as to work in commerce better, they joined the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso and are now on their second loan.  This group of women does commerce in grains, cosmetics, firewood, shoes, clothing, and general merchandise. 

N’tenin, who is the group member with papers in hand in the photo, buys and sells clothing. She intends to use her loan to purchase 15 lengths of 'pagnes' (the colorful cloth of western Africa) of different sorts from Bougouni wholesalers. She makes her sales at the market and at home at the retail level. Accepting cash or credit, she sells to a customer base composed of men and women. 

She envisions making an average monthly profit of 30,000 francs CFA that will be used to invest in her business and to repay the loan.

loans.use: to purchase clothing

loans.name: Juan Gabriel

texts.es: Gabriel, tiene la edad de 20 años,  está en unión libre, y vive con su señora que es su mayor prioridad. El con el crédito va a realizarle mejoras a su moto para facilitarle su trasporte al trabajo y así poder contar con todos los requisitos para transitar en las vías públicas. El tiene su moto para transportarse para el trabajo por lo cual quiere realizarle estas mejoras. El tiene como meta poder transitar por las vías públicas sin ningún problema y trasladarse a su trabajo fácilmente y así poder seguir llevando el sustento a su hogar. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Gabriel, 20, is in a common-law relationship and lives with his wife, who is his biggest priority.

With the loan he's going to make improvements on his motorcycle to facilitate his transportation to work and have all the requirements for traveling on the public streets.  He wants to make these improvements because his motorcycle is for getting to his job.  His goal is to be able to drive through the public streets without any problem and get himself to his job easily so he can continue supporting his household.

This is his first loan from FUDECOSUR.  Previously he hadn't had other loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR offered him a loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to improve his motorcycle

loans.name: Etoile Group

texts.fr:
Mariées majoritairement dans des familles traditionnelles avec une moyenne d’âge de 40 ans et 4 enfants, les six femmes du groupe Etoile habitent toutes dans la ville de Sikasso (3ème Région administrative du Mali) et se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et de leurs activités professionnelles.  
Elles  font de la vente des habits, des céréales, des articles en plastique et des articles divers. 
Dans le but d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe ont intégré Soro Yiriwaso et sont à leur 3ème  cycle de prêt solidaire.
Madame KADIATOU, debout en troisième position de la gauche vers la droite, compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter, 7 pièces de pagne wax. Elle s’approvisionne sur place  à Sikasso, auprès des grossistes et effectue ses ventes  à domicile, à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. Elle compte réaliser avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel moyen de  20.000 FCFA qui sera utilisé, pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et prendre en charge certains besoins du foyer
texts.en:
Most of them married in traditional families and averaging 40 years of age and four children each, the six women of the group Etoile all live in Sikasso City (3rd administrative region of the Republic of Mali). They know one another through ties of kinship, community, and their professional work. They buy and sell clothing, grains, plasticware, and general merchandise. 

With the goal of increasing their business capital, the group members joined the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso and are now on their third solidarity loan cycle.  

Ms. KADIATOU, who is standing third from the left in the photo, intends to use her loan to purchase 7 lengths of Wax 'pagnes' (the colorful cloth of western Africa). She gets her supplies locally in Sikasso from wholesalers and sells from home. Her customer base is composed of men and women. 

With this loan, she plans on making an average monthly profit of 20,000 francs CFA that will be used to reinvest in her business and to meet certain household needs.

loans.use: to purchase Wax 'pagnes' (the colorful cloth of western Africa)

loans.name: Saniya Group

texts.fr:
Mariées majoritairement dans des familles traditionnelles avec une moyenne d’âge de 32 ans et 3 enfants, les quatre femmes du groupe Saniya habitent toutes dans la ville de Sikasso (3ème Région administrative du Mali) et se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et de leurs activités professionnelles.  
Elles  font de la vente des habits, des produits alimentaires et des articles divers. 
Dans le but d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe ont intégré Soro Yiriwaso et sont à leur 2ème cycle de prêt solidaire.
Madame Albatourou fait le commerce de savon, elle est en deuxième position de la gauche vers la droite, elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter  environ 5 sacs de savon Kabakourouni (qui est de fabrication traditionnelle). Elle s’approvisionne sur place  à Sikasso, auprès des grossistes et effectue ses ventes  à domicile, à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. Madame Albatourou compte réaliser avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel moyen de  20.000 FCFA qui sera utilisé, pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et prendre en charge certains besoins du foyer
texts.en:
Most of them married in traditional families and averaging 32 years of age and three children each, the four women of the group Saniya all live in Sikasso City (3rd administrative region of the Republic of Mali). They know one another through ties of kinship, community, and their professional work. They buy and sell clothing, grocery items, and general merchandise. 

With the goal of increasing their business capital, the group members joined the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso and are now on their second solidarity loan cycle.  

Ms. Albatourou does commerce in soap. She is the second from the left in the photo. She intends to use her loan to purchase about 5 bags of Kabakourouni soap (which is made in the traditional manner). She gets her supplies locally in Sikasso from wholesalers and makes her sales from home. Her customer base is composed of men and women. 

With this loan, Ms. Albatourou plans on making an average monthly profit of 20,000 francs CFA that will be used to reinvest in her business and to meet certain household needs.

loans.use: to purchase soap

loans.name: El Cerrito Group

texts.es:
El grupo El Cerrito está integrado por cuatro personas muy humildes y muy trabajadoras, son clientes de VisionFund desde hace varios años solo que en grupos grandes. El nombre del grupo lo eligieron porque donde ellos viven esta un cerrito hermoso que es lo mejor que se puede apreciar de la comunidad.
Natalia platica que tiene 32 años de edad está viviendo en unión libre con el señor Luis juntos han formado una familia con cuatro hijos aunque solo dos de ellos están estudiando pero los cuatro niños se encuentran dependiendo de dicha pareja. Natalia es una mujer muy trabajadora platica que desde niña siempre ha visto como se crían los borregos pero desde hace 11 años inicio con su actividad ella los compra desde pequeños los crece hasta cuando ya están grandes y gordos para ponerlos en venta, los vende a las personas que se lo solicitan por lo regular son las señores que se dedican hacer barbacoa, pero también platica que con la lana de sus borregos cuando se las llega a cortar la vende y para Natalia esta es una muy buena ganancia a su economía, aunque su unica dificultad es en temporada de frios como es noviembre diciembre y enero sus borregos suelen enfermase y morir lo que implicaria para Natilia una perdida de inversion y ganacia para su economia , Doña Natalia está solicitando el crédito para comprar cuatro borregos mas y pastura que necesitara para sus borregos. Natalia comento "Estoy muy contenta y agradecida por el crédito otorgado ya que gracias a sus crédito otorgado podre comprar más borregos ya que lo que más deseo es tener muchos borregos para poder tener mas ganancias y ayudar a mis hijos con los gastos de su estudio"
Así como Natalia y los demás integrantes del grupo están muy contentos y agradecidos con el crédito como Doña Francisca, Alfredo y Tomasa quienes invertirán también en la compra de borregos.
texts.en:
The El Cerrito [The Little Hill] communal bank is comprised of four very humble and very hard-working people.  They have been clients of VisionFund for several years, but only in large groups.  They selected their group name because there is a beautiful hill where they live.  It is the best thing you can see in the community.

Natalia says she is 32 years old, and she in in a common-law marriage with Luis.  Together they have made a family with four children.  However, only two of them go to school.  All four of the children are dependent upon Natalia and Luis.

Natalia is a very hard-working woman.  She says that ever since she was a little girl she has seen how to raise sheep.  Eleven years ago she started her business activity.  She buys them when they are small.  They grow, and when they are big and fat she sells them.  She sells to the people who regularly request them.  The buyers are women who barbecue.  However, she says that when the sheep are sheared she also sells the wool.  This is a good income for Natalia.  Her only difficulty is the cold season like November, December, and January.  Her sheep often get sick and die, which is a loss of investment and income for Natalia.

Natalia is requesting a loan to buy four more sheep and the feed that her sheep will need.  Natalia says, “I am very happy and grateful for the loan that was granted.  Thanks to the loan I will be able to buy more sheep.  What I want the most is to have a lot of sheep in order to be able to have more income and help my children with their educational expenses.”

Natalia and the other members of the group are happy and grateful for the loan.  Francisca, Alfredo, and Tomas also want to buy sheep.

loans.use: to buy four sheep and feed.

location.town: San Miguel La Labor, San Felipe del Progreso

loans.name: Luz Dary

texts.es:
Luz Dary de 49 años de edad, aprendió el oficio de la confección desde hace 30 años. Laboró en diferentes talleres de este gremio por 10 años y se vio en la obligación de retirarse cuando tuvo a su hijo. Es madre soltera lo cual fue un factor determinante para que esta mujer decidiera seguir laborando desde su casa. Hoy se dedica a la confección de ropa femenina que vende en diferentes almacenes del municipio de Itagüí, Colombia.
Esta actividad le ha permitido darle educación a su hijo y brindarle lo que puede en la medida de sus capacidades. 
Su mayor sueño es poder tener una línea propia de blusas y comprar una vivienda amplia para organizar su taller. En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de una máquina plana e insumos para incrementar su nivel de producción y generar mayores ingresos.
texts.en:
Luz Dary is 49 years old.  She learned the dressmaking trade thirty years ago and worked in this trade at various workshops for ten years.  However, she felt obliged to retire when she had her son.  She is a single mother, which was a determining factor in her decision to continue working from her home.  

Today, she makes women’s clothing that she sells to various shops in the town of Itagüí, Colombia. This activity has allowed her to give her son an education and provide what she can for him to the best of her abilities.  Her greatest dream is to be able to have her own line of blouses and buy a large house to organize her workshop.  Currently, she is requesting a loan to purchase a flat sewing machine and materials to increase her production level and generate more income.

loans.use: to purchase a flat sewing machine and materials.

loans.name: Gloria Elizeth

texts.es:
Gloria, se dedica a la sastrería, fabricando prendas de vestir, ella tiene 36 años de edad, vive con su esposo, tiene una hija que padece el síndrome Down, tiene 5 años de edad; Gloria se dedica a la sastrería de lunes a sábado, tiene una empleada, esto lo aprendió con un familiar.
Solicita un préstamo para la compra de materiales de costura, Telas en variedad, hilo, retazos, que son los necesarios, esta compra le ayudara para mantener la suficiente cantidad y mejorar los ingresos.
La aspiración de Gloria es fortalecer mas el negocio, ofreciendo una mejor condición de vida a su familia y estar al pendiente de su hija.
texts.en:
Gloria has a tailoring business where she makes garments.  She is 36 years old and lives with her husband.  She has a 5 year-old daughter who has Down's syndrome.  Gloria works in her business Monday through Saturday, and she has 1 employee.  She learned this trade from a relative.

She is requesting a loan to buy dressmaking materials, including: a variety of fabrics, thread, and fabric remnants which she needs.  This purchase will help her to keep her business adequately supplied with raw materials so that she can increase her income.

Gloria aspires to strengthen her business so that she can provide better living conditions to her family and take care of her daughter.

loans.use: to buy a variety of fabric, thread, and fabric remnants

loans.name: Jose Mario

texts.es:
José, vive con su esposa y tiene dos hijos de 18 y 21 años de edad, viven en casa propia, él tiene 12 años de estar atendiendo el negocio de productos domésticos, lo inicio junto a su esposa y lo atiende desde las 6:00am hasta las 7:00pm todos los días. 
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de mercadería para surtir el negocio, jugos, gaseosas, arroz, aceite, azúcar, sal, entre otros productos que son demandados en la tienda, con este préstamo comprara la mercadería y la atención de los clientes será mejor.
La aspiración de José es mejorar su economía en la familia, gozar de buena salud y fortalecer el negocio.
texts.en:
Jose lives with his wife and has 2 children aged 18 and 21.  They live in their own house.  For 12 years, he has had a business selling products used in the home.  He started this business with his wife, and he tends to it from 6am until 7pm daily.

Jose is requesting a loan to buy merchandise to stock his store, including: juices, soft drinks, rice, cooking oil, sugar, salt, and other products that his customers demand in the store.  With this loan, he will buy merchandise and improve his ability to serve his customers.

Jose aspires to improve his family's financial situation.  He also hopes to enjoy good health and to strengthen his business.

loans.use: to buy juices, soft drinks, rice, cooking oil, sugar, and salt

loans.name: Digna Rosabell

texts.es:
Digna, solicita un nuevo préstamo para la compra de mercadería para surtir el negocio, adquiriendo ropa variada y tambien merienda, para aprovechar la temporada, camisas, blusas, pantalones, short, tambien condimentos, aceite y otros productos necesarios para continuar realizando el negocio.
Con el préstamo anterior considera que tuvo un efecto positivo, ya que la venta de merienda se mantuvo estable, agrego tambien otro rubro que es la venta de ropa. En su familia Digna comenta que los ingresos se han mantenido.
texts.en: Digna is requesting a new loan to buy merchandise to stock her business.  She will acquire a variety of clothing, and also snacks, so that she can take advantage of the season.  She will buy: shirts, blouses, pants, shorts, and also condiments, cooking oil, and other products she needs to continue with her business.  She thinks that her previous loan was successful because she kept her sales of snacks constant and added another line of work, which is selling clothing.  Digna comments that she has been able to maintain her family's income.

loans.use: to buy shirts, blouses, pants, shorts, condiments, and cooking oil

loans.name: Irene De Jesùs

texts.es:
“Para tener un negocio se necesita ser capaz de soñar. Yo inicié mi negocio con mucho temor y hoy, gracias a Dios he logrado tener una linda experiencia. He podido contar con el apoyo de mi familia y con la buena acogida por parte de la comunidad por el servicio que presto” Con estas palabras, Irene de 42 años de edad cuenta como ha sido su experiencia cuando decidió convertirse en una empresaria.  Su mayor satisfacción es poder servir a otras personas Y saber que alivia la carga de muchas amas de casa de su localidad al alquilar sus lavadoras.

Irene es una mujer llena de sueños y con un proyecto sólido, En la actualidad se encuentra en búsqueda de un crédito con el que comprará tres lavadoras con el fin de ampliar y mejorar su capacidad en el servicio. 
Su familia es su razón de ser y el motor que la impulsa a trabajar arduamente cada día, espera que su negocio le proporcione las condiciones económicas para comprar la casa que sueña tener.
texts.en: "To have a business, you have have to be able to dream. I started my business with a lot of worry and today, thanks to God, I have gained a wonderful experience. I have had the support of my family and the warm reception of the community for the services I provide." With these words, Irene, 42, tells us about her experience once she decided to become a businesswoman. Her greatest satisfaction is serving others and knowing that she lightens the load for many homemakers in her area who rent her machines. Irene is a women who has a solid project and is full of dreams. She is currently seeking a loan to buy three washing machines, with the goal of expanding and improving the capacity of the service. Her family is her reason for being and the driving force that pushes her to work hard every day. She hopes that her business grants her the economic conditions to buy the house she dreams of having.

loans.use: to buy three washing machines.

loans.name: Álvaro

texts.es:
Álvaro tiene 47 años de edad y laboró la mayor parte de su vida en una finca como mayordomo, tras quedarse sin empleo debido a que los dueños decidieron vender la finca, se vio en la necesidad de buscar una fuente de ingresos para el sostenimiento de su familia. Vendió una vaca que tenía y compró un carro para la venta de mangos. 

En la actualidad se ubica a  la entrada de las escuelas para vender su producto y generar ingresos que le permita ofrecerle a su familia una vida digna. Su mayor sueño es poder tener una vivienda propia para mejorar su calidad de vida. Se encuentra solicitando un crédito el cual invertirá en la compra de materia prima para ampliar sus ventas y aprovechar el regreso a clases.
texts.en:
Alvaro, 47, worked for most of his life on a farm as a foreman until the owners sold the farm and left him without work.  After that, he saw the need to find another source of income to support his family.  He sold a cow that he had, and bought a cart to sell mangoes. 

Now he sets up his business at the entrance of some schools so that he can sell his products and generate an income that will allow him to provide his family with a decent life.  His main dream is to be able to have his own house so that he could improve his quality of life.  He is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of raw materials to increase his sales and take advantage of the fact that students are returning to classes.

loans.use: to buy mangoes

loans.name: Edilberto

texts.es: Edilberto de 36 años de edad, le ha tocado construir a pulso su negocio. Sin saber nada de panadería decidió meterse en el cuento, alquiló un local y consiguió empleados para materializar su idea de negocio. En la actualidad ha tenido una serie de dificultades con sanidad por la forma de producción, por lo cual se encuentra solicitando un crédito para realizar adecuaciones exigidas por dicha institución. Su mayor sueño es poder incrementar su nivel de ventas para generar mayor empleo. Edilberto es un hombre lleno de retos y ambiciones, aunque no conoce mucho del tema decidió arriesgarse por el sector de panificación, y hoy desea adquirir mayor conocimiento sobre el oficio para ser más competente en el mercado.
texts.en:
Edilberto, 36, built his business by himself.  He decided to get involved in baking without knowing anything about it.  He rented a space and hired employees to make his business idea come true.

Currently he has had a series of problems with the health service because of his form of production, so he's requesting a loan to make the modifications required by that institution.

His biggest dream is to be able to increase his sales to generate more jobs.  Edilberto's a man full of challenges and ambition.  Although he doesn't know much about the bakery field, he decided to take a risk.  Now he wants to acquire more knowledge about the trade to be more competent in the market.

loans.use: to make modifications to his bakery factory

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es: María Elena, tiene la edad de 36 años, está casada, vive con sus hijos y su esposo que son sus mayores prioridades. Ella con el crédito va comprar los materiales para la construcción y así  mejorar  su hogar. Ella cuenta con su humilde casita y necesita hacerle unas mejoras a una pared que por paso del tiempo el agua a deteriorado. Ella tiene pensado con esto darle una mejor apariencia a su casa y a la vez mejorar de forma placentera el descansar de forma segura en su casa. Ella espera poder darle el mejor acabado y brindarle a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida y satisfacción del descansar.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: María Elena, 36, is married and lives with her children and husband, who are her greatest priorities. With the loan, she will buy construction materials and improve her home. She has a humble little house and she needs to make some improvements to a wall that has deteriorated over time because of water. She plans to improve the appearance of her home and at the same time, pleasantly and safely improve the restfulness of her house. She hopes to be able to give it a better finish and give her children a better quality of life and the satisfaction of restfulness. This is the first loan that she has recieved from FUDECOSUR. She had never taken other loans from state banks before, but FUDECOSUR has given her a loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to improve her home.

loans.name: Dulce De Jesus

texts.es:
Dulce, quiere invertir en el negocio, por eso solicita un nuevo préstamo para la compra de frutas y verduras frescas como: plátanos, tomates, papas, repollo, aguacates, lechuga, con esta compra estará preparada para atender la clientela.
Ella considera que el crédito anterior le ayudo a incrementar sus ingresos, ya que tenía el negocio muy surtido y  con esto ha permanecido trabajando, sus condiciones en la familia han mejorado.
texts.en:
Dulce wants to invest in her business. Consequently she is requesting a new loan in order to buy fresh fruits and vegetables, such as bananas, tomatoes, potatoes, cabbages, avocados, lettuce, etc. With this purchase she will be prepared for her customers.

Dulce feels that her previous loan helped her to increase earnings because her business was very well stocked. The loan enabled her to keep working and her family's living conditions have improved.

loans.use: to purchase bananas, tomatoes, potatoes, cabbages, avocados and lettuce.

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es:
Víctor, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo para poder invertir en la venta de especias, con el objetivo de mejorar sus ventas, comprara orégano, pimienta, bicarbonato, linaza, entre otras hierbas que existen.
El manifiesta que el préstamo le permitió mejorar la disponibilidad en el negocio, tambien que su familia cuente con el alimento necesario, gracias a la inversión con el préstamo ha mejorado su condición económica.
texts.en:
Victor has decided to request a new loan so that he can invest in his business selling spices.  His goal is to increase his income.  With this loan, he will buy oregano, pepper, bicarbonate, flax seed, and other herbs.

He states that his previous loan allowed him to increase the availability of products in his business and feed his family.  Thanks to this investment, his financial situation has improved.

loans.use: to buy oregano, pepper, bicarbonate, and flax seed

loans.name: Diana Milena

texts.es: Diana de 35 años, es separada y madre de mellizos menores de edad, Su vida se ha visto marcada por la difícil situación que le ha tocado afrontar con sus hijos después de que su esposo la abandonara y se rehusara a ayudarle económicamente con los gastos. Dada las condiciones de su hogar y la falta de educación, Diana no tuvo más alternativa de dedicarse a la cría de cerdos para generar ingresos y solventar las necesidades de su casa. Esta actividad le ha permitido sacar adelante su familia y ofrecerles un mejor panorama. Su mayor anhelo es poder tener mejores ingresos que le permita ofrecerles educación y una vida digna a sus hijos. Desea poderse convertir en una gran microempresaria por lo cual requiere incrementar su capacidad de producción. Para lograr esta meta se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de concentrado para engordar más rápido sus cerdos y poder generar mayores ingresos que invertirá en la compra de los aguinaldos navideños para sus hijos y de nuevos cerdos.
texts.en:
Diana, 35, is separated and is the mother of minor twins.  She's faced a difficult situation in her life, as her husband abandoned her and the twins and has refused to help her financially with the expenses.  Given the conditions in her home and her lack of education, Diana had no alternative but to develop a business selling pigs so that she could generate income and cover the household expenses.  This activity has enabled her to provide for her family and give them a better outlook.  

Diana's main wish is to be able to have more income, so that she could provide her children with an education and a decent life.  She wants to become a great small-businesswoman, and to do this she needs to expand her production capacity.  To achieve this goal, she is requesting a loan to invest in concentrated animal feed so that she can fatten her pigs more rapidly.  This way she could generate  more income, which she will use to buy Christmas gifts for her children and more pigs.

loans.use: to buy animal feed to fatten her pigs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy some domestic appliances for his home.

loans.name: Gina Isabel

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de tienda de abarrotes pequeña,la socia vende arroz,azucar,leche,galletas y aceite,la socia ya tiene 2 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes.La socia solicita el credito para comprar arroz,azucar,leche y aceite.

La socia Gina se encuentra agradecido por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Gina continues working in her small grocery store business.  She sells rice, sugar, milk, cookies, and oil.  She has been in this business for two years already and it's going very well for her.  Her dream is to expand her store.

She's requesting the loan to buy rice, sugar, milk, and oil.

She's grateful for this opportunity and is committed to making her payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, milk, and oil

loans.name: Andrea

texts.es: Andrea invirtió su credikiva en materias primas e insumos en un mayor volumen como maíz por bulto, aceite en pimpina, productos cárnicos y le alcanzó hasta para comprar una vitrina con la que inició su negocio de venta de variedades. Sus ingresos fueron superiores y su negocio así mismo creció.  Ella da el siguiente mensaje: “Agradezco a mis patrocinadores por apoyarme con ese crédito; gracias a él he salido adelante. “ En la actualidad se prepara para un nuevo credikiva con el cual comprará muchas más materias primas como aceite, maíz y cárnicos y tambien surtirá su vitrina con mercancias variadas, porque es época de fiestas y el consumo de sus clientes se hace mucho mayor y ella debe responderá sus expectativa para continuar haciéndolos fieles y aumentar también su capital de trabajo, para ganar mucho mas y esto lo conseguirá gracias a Kiva  y la disponibilidad de sus fondos para crédito.
texts.en: Andrea invested her Kiva loan into supplies and ingredients such as sacks of corn, pimpina oil, meat products, and she had enough left to buy a display case where she started her varieties business.  Her income increased and her business grew.  She says, “I am grateful to my sponsor for supporting this loan.  Thanks to it, I’ve gotten ahead.”  She is asking for a new kiva loan with which she will buy many supplies such as cooking oil, corn, meat products, and will also stock her display case with a variety of merchandise.  This is the season of celebrations; her customer’s consumption increases, and she must be able to respond to keep them loyal and increase her working capital and income.  She will achieve this thanks to Kiva and the access to funds for her loan.

loans.use: to buy supplies and ingredients.

loans.name: Joany Arlez

texts.es: Joany de 44 años edad, es casado y tiene 4 hijos. Desde joven se ha dedicado al comercio, pero  desde hace 4 años decidió montar su propio negocio. Su familia es su motivación y su fuente de energía, trabaja todos los días de 7 de la mañana a 9 de la noche y su esposa le ayuda después de atender a sus hijos y realizar las labores del hogar. Espera que su negocio crezca para generar mayores ingresos y ofrecerles a sus dos hijos mayores la posibilidad de entrar a la universidad. Joany tiene grandes retos en la vida y desea luchar por ellos, el más prioritario es comprar una vivienda para su familia, pero aún no cuenta con los recursos suficientes. Desea solicitar un préstamo para invertirlo en su tienda y generar mayores entradas que le permitan destinar una parte para la cuota inicial de su casa. Espera poderle mejorar a su familia la situación económica para cambiar la calidad de vida.
texts.en: Joany is 44 and is married with 4 children.  He has been a salesman since he was young but, 4 years ago, decided to set up his own shop.  His family is his source of motivation and energy and he works every day from 7am to 9pm. His wife also helps him when she has looked after the children and finished her housework.  He hopes to see his business grow and generate a greater income which will give his two older children the chance to go to university.  Joany faces great challenges in life, and is determined to overcome them.  His number one priority is to buy a home for his family, but he currently lacks sufficient resources.  He wants to apply for a loan to invest in his shop and generate more income, so he can use part of it as a down payment on his house.  He hopes that he can improve his family's financial position and change their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy grocery products

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
La señora Martha tiene una tienda de barrio en su domicilio, vive en casa propia en un acabado de fino y piso de machimbre, su vivienda esta ubicada el la zona de Irpavi de la ciudad de La Paz.
Martha tiene una tienda de barrio donde vende diversos productos, del cual genera sus ingresos para cubrir sus gastos de alimentación, luz, agua;  el crédito lo  requiere para el aumento de capital; comprará gaseosas, galletas, arroz, azúcar y otros para surtir su tienda y así mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida.
El sueño de Martha es ampliar su negocio.
Es la novena vez con IMPRO y la tercera con Kiva.
texts.en:
Martha has a neighborhood store in her home. She lives in her own home, with finished walls and tongue and groove wood flooring. Her home is located in the Irpavi area of the city of the La Paz.

Martha has a neighborhood store where she sells various products, from which she generates income to cover expenses for food, electricity and water. She needs the loan to increase her working capital. 

She will buy soft drinks, cookies, rice, sugar, and other items for supplying her store, and this way improve her income and her quality of life. Martha's dream is to expand her business. This is her nonth loan with IMPRO and her third with Kiva.

loans.use: To buy soft drinks, cookies, rice, sugar and other items for her grocery store.

loans.name: Franz

texts.es:
El señor Franz se dedica a la venta de singani artesanal, vive en casa propia en un acabado fino y piso de cemento, su vivienda esta ubicada en la zona de Obrajes de la ciudad de La Paz
Franz vende singani artesanal, del cual genera sus ingresos para cubrir sus gastos de alimentación, luz, agua;  el crédito lo  requiere para el aumento de su producción, comprará singani (destilado de uva), botellas, corcho y así incrementar sus ventas y mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida.
El sueño de Franz es tener hacer crecer su negocio.
Es la segunda vez con Kiva.
texts.en:
Franz sells artisanal singani (brandy made from grapes). He lives in his own home with finished walls and cement floor. His home is located in the Obrajes area of the city of La Paz.

Franz sells artisanal singani, from which he generates income to cover his expenses for food, electricity and water. He needs the loan to increase his production. He will buy singani (distilled from grapes), bottles and corks. This way he will increase his sales and improve his income and quality of life. 

Franz's dream is to make his business grow. This is his second loan with Kiva.

loans.use: To buy singani (brandy made from grapes), bottles and corks, in order to continue his business making and selling artisanal singani.

loans.name: Blanca Lidia

texts.es:
Blanca, se dedica a la venta de pan, tamales, meriendas, vive con sus dos hijos quienes estudian, Blanca aprendió su oficio en compañía de su madre, quien se dedica a esta actividad, realiza diferentes tipos de ventas de típicos lleva cuatro años en este negocio.
Solicita un préstamo para la compra de insumos para la merienda, comprando pan en variedad, y tambien invertirá en una parte ropa nueva para la temporada, esto le permitirá tener una nueva fuente de ingresos en el negocio.
El objetivo de Blanca es ampliar el negocio, agregando otro tipo de productos para la venta, tambien quiere tener su propio local, tambien y apoyar a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Blanca sells bread, tamales and snacks. She lives with her two children, both of whom are students. She learned the trade by working with her mother, who is also engaged in the business. Blanca sells different kinds of traditional food and has had her own business for four years.

She is requesting a loan to purchase ingredients for her snacks and different varieties of bread. She will also invest part of the money in new seasonal clothing. This will enable her to have a new source of income.

Blanca’s goal is to expand her business by adding other types of products for sale. She also wants to have her own shop and to continue supporting her children.

loans.use: to purchase different kinds of bread as well as new clothing to sell.

loans.name: Ana Hilda

texts.es:
Ana, se decidió por un nuevo préstamo para la compra de mercadería, aprovechando la temporada de mayor demanda, se comprara blusas, pantalones, ropa interior para damas, esto le servirá para la venta a los clientes.
Ella ha tenido un efecto positivo con el negocio, sus ganancias las utiliza para su familia, hoy en día se encuentra mejor, ha mejorado su condición y cuentan con buena salud todos en su hogar.
texts.en:
Ana decided to request a new loan in order to buy merchandise. She will be taking advantage of a time of high demand. Ana will buy blouses, trousers, and women’s undergarments that she can sell to her customers.

She has experienced positive effects with her business. The profits have been used for her family and now they are in a much better condition. Everyone in her household is also in good health.

loans.use: to buy blouses, trousers, and women’s undergarments.

loans.name: Teresa Del Carmen

texts.es:
Teresa, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para la temporada navideña, porque quiere incrementar su venta, para esto comprara chicharrón, frijoles, maíz, repollo, leña, estos son los más necesarios para poder preparar la venta.
Con el préstamo anterior mejoro su negocio, manteniendo más disponibilidad de productos, atendiendo a los clientes, con esto su condición en la familia a permanecido estable.
texts.en:
Teresa is requesting a new loan for the Christmas season because she wants to increase her sales.  To do this, she will buy pork, beans, corn, cabbage, and firewood.  These are the supplies she needs to make the food that she sells.

With her previous loan she improved her business by having more products available to serve to her customers.  As a result, her family's situation remained stable.

loans.use: to buy pork, beans, corn, cabbage, and firewood

loans.name: Santos Elias

texts.es:
Santos, necesita un nuevo crédito para fortalecer su negocio de la venta de tortillas y tamales, para esto comprara leña y maíz por mayoreo, condimentos y los demás ingredientes para la elaboración de los tamales y las tortillas.

Con el préstamo anterior logro tener lo necesario para el negocio, mejorando la ventas y en este tiempo ella y su familia han hecho mejoras a la vivienda, manifiesta estar satisfecha con el trabajo realizado en el negocio.
texts.en:
Santos needs a new loan to strengthen his business selling tortillas and tamales.  He will use the loan to buy firewood and corn at wholesale, condiments, and other ingredients to make tamales and tortillas.

With his previous loan, he was able to get everything he needed for his business and was able to increase his sales.  Now, he and his family have made improvements to their house.  He states that he is satisfied with the work that he has carried out with his business.

loans.use: to buy firewood and corn at wholesale, and to buy condiments

loans.name: Beatriz Elena

texts.es:
Beatriz de 37 años, es madre de tres hijos menores de edad. Se ha dedicado al sector de la confección desde su juventud, debido a que laboró en una empresa de este gremio. Después de quedar embarazada de su primer hijo se tuvo que retirar porque fue conciente que necesitaba el tiempo para dedicarse al cuidado de su bebe. Por lo cual decidió laborar desde su casa como independiente realizando todo tipo de arreglos a sus vecinos. Ahorró por varios años para la compra de una máquina fileteadora, con la cual comenzó a confeccionar blusas que vende en el centro de la Ciudad de Medellín y en el municipio de Rionegro, Colombia. Su mayor sueño es poderse convertir en una empresaria de éxito, expandiendo su empresa y ser una generadora de empleo para muchas familias. Sus hijos son su mayor motivación por lo cual trata de dar siempre lo mejor para que estos gocen de una mejor calidad de vida. 
En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un crédito con el que espera comprar insumos como telas, hijos, agujas, con el fin de aumentar su capacidad de producción en la temporada de fin de año.
texts.en: Beatriz is 37 years old and the mother of three young children.  She has been engaged in the dressmaking business since her youth and because of that, worked in this trade as a dressmaker in a company.  After becoming pregnant with her first child, she had to retire because she knew that she needed time to devote herself to caring for her baby.  Consequently, she decided to work independently from her home and made arrangements with her neighbors.  She saved for several years to purchase an overlock sewing machine and began to make blouses that she sells in Medellín’s city center as well as in Rionegro, Colombia.  Her greatest dream is to become a successful entrepreneur, expand her company, and generate employment for many families.  Her children are her greatest motivation and she always tries to give them the best so that they have a better quality of life.  Currently, she is requesting a loan with which she plans to purchase supplies such as fabric, thread, and needles in order to increase her production capacity in the year-end season

loans.use: to purchase supplies - fabric, thread, needles.

loans.name: Ricardo Adan

texts.es:
Ricardo, se decide para un nuevo préstamo, porque quiere comprar mercadería para la tienda que ha instalado, adquiriendo productos como azúcar, arroz, aceite, entre otros que sean necesarios para seguir trabajado.
Con el préstamo anterior fortaleció el negocio, aumento su capacidad para generar ganancias, esto le ha servido para la manutención de su familia, él considera que sus condiciones están mejor que antes.
texts.en: Ricardo decided to apply for a new loan because he wants to buy merchandise such as sugar, rice, oil, and more to keep his store running. His previous loan strengthened his business and increased his income, which helped him support his family and improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to buy sugar, rice, and oil.

loans.name: Mario

texts.es:
Mario, necesita invertir en el negocio, para la recolección de la cosecha de los granos básicos, pagara mano de obra y alquilara tambien el terreno que servirá para el cultivo de la próxima temporada, esto ayudara para que Mario tenga la cosecha lista para el consumo.
El considera que su trabajo ha mejorado con el apoyo de los préstamos, le sirven para mantener a su familia en mejores condiciones, todos cuentan con buena salud y Mario está listo para iniciar el próximo año con más trabajo.
texts.en:
Mario needs to invest in his business.  In order to bring in the harvest of basic grains, he will pay day laborers.  He will also rent land that will serve for next season's planting.  This will help Mario get the harvest ready for consumption.

Mario believes that his work has improved because of the help of the loans.  They help him keep his family in good conditions.  They are all healthy and Mario is ready to begin next year with more work.

loans.use: to pay day laborers to bring in the harvest and for rental of land.

loans.name: Jesus

texts.es: Jesús, está casado, vive con su esposa e hijos que son su mayor prioridad. El con el crédito pretende comprar los insumos necesarios para asistir la siembra de maíz. El tiene una pequeña plantación que necesita asistirla para mejorar su estado y su rendimiento para la cosecha, por lo cual tomo la decisión de abonarla. El tiene pensado obtener de la siembra el máximo de las ganancias con la cosecha y así poder salir adelante con los pagos del crédito y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida para el futuro.  Es el tercer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Jesús is married and lives with his wife and children, who are his biggest priority.

With the loan he plans to buy the supplies he needs for planting corn.

He has a small farm that he needs to take care of so he can improve his living conditions and his efficiency for the harvest, so he decided to fertilize it.  He plans to get the most out of his profits from the planting with the harvest, so he'll be able to get ahead with the loan payments and give his family a better quality of life in the future.

This is his third loan from FUDECOSUR.  He hadn't had other loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR offered him a loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy supplies to plant corn

loans.name: Elkin

texts.es:
Élkin tiene 28 años de edad, y lo que le sobran son ganas de salir adelante en búsqueda de un mejor futuro para el y sus padres. En su vereda lo conocen como un chico emprendedor, esforzado y muy trabajador. Desde niño a sido amante al campo, pues toda su vida ha vivido en la zona rural del municipio de San Rafael, Colombia. 

Lleno de proyectos y con una gran visión hacia el futuro, Élkin comenzó con su proyecto de empresa en la finca de su padre hace 2 años, el cual le prestó una parcela para la siembra de café y caña de azúcar. Su anhelo es poder expandir su negocio e introducir valor agregado a su producto, lo que le permitirá obtener mayores ganancias. Por esta razón se encuentra solicitando un crédito el cual invertirá en la compra de abono para generar productos de mayor calidad. 
Élkin está convencido que la calidad es uno  de los factores para fidelizar sus clientes y como no cuenta con el dinero para realizar dicha inversión a recurrido a la solicitud de un crédito para materializarlo.
texts.en:
Elkin is 28 years old and retains a strong desire to get ahead, searching for a better future for himself and his parents. On his lane, he is known as a 'boy entreprenuer', always pressing ahead and working hard. Since he was a child, Elkin has loved the countryside. having lived all his life in rural San Rafael municipality, Colombia.  

Filled with projects and with a grand vision for the future, Elkin began his entreprenuerial project on his father's farm some 2 years ago. His father loaned him a parcel of land on which to plant coffee and sugar cane. Elkin's dream is to be able to expand his business and introduce added value to the harvest,  allowing him to obtain greater earnings. For this reason, Elkin is requesting a loan to purchase manure in order to generate better product quality. 

Elkin is convinced that quality is one of the factors in attracting customer loyalty, and since he lacks the money to achieve the investment on his own, he is turning to a loan to do so.

loans.use: to buy manure to fertilize his coffee and cane plantings.

loans.name: Bartolo

texts.es: Bartolo de sesenta y tres años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia, él se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de plátano, tiene mas de veinte años de trabajo en el rubro que le han regalado experiencia valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas y al mismo tiempo alcanzar muy buenas ganancias, el terreno de cultivo esta ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola, cercano a su vivienda, comercia en todos los alrededores de la localidad y se ha hecho de mucha clientela que lo prefiere por la calidad, lo buenos precios y el excelente servicio; además puede arrendar tierras si necesita complementar gastos en el hogar,  Bartolo es un hombre amable, honesto muy dedicado a su labor todos los días lucha por ganarse un futuro mejor sabe que con todo su esfuerzo y dedicación lograra el éxito que desea; en la ultima temporada de siembra tuvo algunas perdidas y quiere recuperarse por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL  un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de plátano, insecticida, herbicida, herramienta, etc. Bartolo tiene buenas referencias de pago, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene confianza que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Bartolo, 63, lives with his life partner and children in his own house.  He is a farmer who cultivates bananas.  He has been doing this work for more than 20 years, over which time he has acquired valuable experience, allowing him to obtain better harvests and good earnings.  The land that he cultivates is located in an agricultural area that is close to his house.  He sells his harvests in all of the areas surrounding his town, and he has garnered a lot of customers who prefer his products because of their quality and good prices, and because of his excellent service.  In addition, he is able to rent some land if needed to cover the household expenses.  

Bartolo is a friendly and honest man who devotes himself to his work every day, striving to gain a better future.  He knows that with effort and dedication, he will achieve the success that he desires.  During the last season he had some losses, and he wants to recover from this.  For this reason, he is seeking a loan from INTEGRAL to buy banana seeds, insecticides, herbicides, tools, etc.  Bartolo has good references, and he is certain that he will be able to pay off the loan.  Also, he is confident that with this loan, he will be able to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy banana seeds, insecticides, herbicides, and tools

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn seed, watermelon, insecticide, and tools.

loans.name: Darnelly

texts.es:
Darnelly de 41 años, es casada y tiene dos hijos de 15 y 20 años de edad, a los cuales se ha dedicado desde que nacieron, razón por la cual nunca laboró. Debido a la difícil situación por la que se encuentran atravesando, debido a que su esposo se quedó sin empleo. Ella tomó la determinación de vender productos por catálogo, el cual no demanda mucho tiempo y le permite estar pendiente de los deberes del hogar. Darnelly es una mujer luchadora que no se rinde ante las pruebas que se encuentra en el camino, con valentía y vigor, lucha por sacar adelante a su familia. 

Su mayor sueño es poder mejorar su condición económica y poderle ofrecer a sus dos hijos la oportunidad de ingresar a la universidad, para que se formen como profesionales. En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de mercancía-Ropa- para la venta, en la temporada de fin de año, con el fin de aumentar sus ingresos y mejorar la calidad de vida en su hogar.
texts.en:
Darnelly, 41, is married and has two children, ages 15 and 20. Since she has cared for them since birth, she has never worked outside the home. She now finds herself in a difficult situation because her husband is unemployed. She has decided to sell catalog merchandise, which does not involve a lot of time and allows her to do household chores. Darnelly is determined and won't give up despite the obstacles in her path; she will work hard and courageously to provide for her family. 

Her main dream is to improve her financial situation and offer her children the opportunity to go to college and have careers. She is now applying for a loan to buy clothing to sell during the year-end season so that she can increase her income and improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy clothing inventory.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sorbets, popsicles, and cones

loans.name: Jaider Andrés

texts.es:
Jaider de 24 años de edad es un hombre emprendedor y visionario, tras quedarse sin empleo decidió montar un almacén de ropa y accesorios con sus ahorros, para tener una fuente de ingresos que pudiera solventar las necesidades de su casa.  Su mayor deseo es convertirse en un gran comerciante, vender al por mayor, surtiendo los negocios de su localidad. 
El tiene claro que para alcanzar sus sueños se necesita de disciplina y constancia, por ello ya dio el primer paso. Todos los días se dirige abrir su negocio a las ocho de la mañana y comienza su faena.
Su familia siente gran admiración porque su esfuerzo lo está conduciendo por un buen camino, además porque a parte de ser bueno en los negocio es buen hijo y hermano. 
Jaider se encuentra en búsqueda de un crédito con el que diversificará el surtido en su almacén, realizará compra de calzado y ropa para la temporada de fin de año con el fin de incrementar sus ventas y generar mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
Jaider is 24, enterprising, and forward thinking. After losing his job, he decided to open a clothing and accessories store with his savings to have an income source to pay his living expenses. He wants to be a great merchant and sell wholesale merchandise to local businesses. He knows that discipline and perseverance are required to achieve his dreams, and this is his first step. Every day he opens his business at 8 am to begin working.

His family admires him because his efforts are leading him in the right direction and because, besides being a good person, he is a good son and brother. Jaider is applying for a loan to expand the store's selection and will buy shoes and clothing for the year-end season so that he can increase his sales and earnings.

loans.use: to buy clothing and shoes.

loans.name: Amanecer Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “AMANECER”  iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Collpani, está compuesta por siete integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Flora es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de zapatillas, venta de aceite, venta de videos, venta de ropa, venta de ropa de bebe, venta de api, venta de chamarras, venta de cosméticos.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Flora es integrante, ella indica que hace un años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una amiga que es socia de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de carne, negocio que aprendió a manejar por enseñanza de una amiga.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de carne) que adquirirá del matadero de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener en lo posible a su hogar pues ella es casada y tiene cinco hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las capacitaciones del área de crédito y salud.

Al grupo le acompaña la prima de la señora Nancy que esta ubicada en la parte posterior, vestida de color rosado.
texts.en:
The "Amanecer" communal bank will start with its first loan with Pro Mujer as part of the regional office of Collpani. The group is made up of seven members and is led by board of directors whose president is Flora. The businesses that the communal bank members work at are varied. Among them are shoe sales, oil sales, video sales, clothing sales, infant clothing sales, api [Bolivian purple corn drink] sales, jacket sales, and cosmetics sales.

The loan they are taking out now will benefit these small business owners. Flora is a member of this group and she says that she has been a member of Pro Mujer for a few years. She became a member through the invitation of a friend who is a partner at the institution. She currently has a business selling meat. She learned how to manage the business through training from a friend. 

The loan that she is taking out now is to increase her capital (buying meat) that she will acquire from the slaughterhouse in the city of El Alto. Later she will sell the meat in her sales space. This kind of work allows her to generate resources to support her home as much as possible as she is married and has five children.When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says that she likes the trainings in the areas of credit and health. 

The group is accompanied by the cousin of Nancy, who is located in the back wearing pink.

loans.use: to buy meat.

loans.name: Jehova Es Mi Pastor Group

texts.es: El banco comunal Jehová es mi Pastor está conformado por 14 integrantes, todos mayores de edad con  20 hijos bajo su responsabilidad. Ellos son originarios del departamento de León, municipio de Malpaisillo, lugar que está ubicado en la zona de occidente del país. León  es un lugar que se caracteriza por tener personas trabajadoras, responsables, gente acogedora. Este banco decidió unirse y aprovechar las ventajas del crédito para trabajar en sus diferentes negocios. Ya que se conocen entre sí y se apoyan mutuamente para salir adelante. El coordinador del banco es  Alejandra Catalina ella tiene por actividad una pulpería ubicada en su casa de habitación. Una pulpería es una pequeña tienda que vende productos comestible y en cantidades pequeñas como: sobre de café, sobre de shapoo. Arroz, frijoles cosidos, aceite, jabón, jugos, gaseosas, galletas, detergentes, pan, huevos.  La rutina diaria de Alejandra es Trabajar unas 10 horas diarias atendiendo a sus clientelas. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajos y surtir su pequeño negocio para brindar mejor servicios a los pobladores de su vecindario. EL banco comunal agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva les brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países necesitados de fuentes de trabajo como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de vida digno.
texts.en:
The Jehová es mi Pastor ("Jehovah is my Shepherd") communal bank is made up of 14 members, all adults with 20 children in their care. They are from the municipality of Malpaisillo in the department of León, which is located in the western part of the country. León is characterized by hardworking, responsible, and friendly people.

This bank decided to unite and take advantage of the benefits of a loan to work in their different businesses. They know each other and support each other to succeed. The bank's coordinator is Alejandra Catalina. She makes a living with a small grocery store, or "pulpería," located in her home. A pulpería is a small store which sells groceries in small quantities such as coffee, shampoo, rice, cooked beans, oil, soap, juice, soda, cookies, detergent, bread, and eggs. Alejandra's daily routine is to work for 10 hours attending clients. 

The goal of this loan is to invest in working capital and stock her small business in order to offer a better service to the people of her neighborhood. The communal bank is grateful for the help which Kiva lenders provide to people with limited resources in countries lacking sources of employment, such as Nicaragua, so that they can have a decent livelihood.

loans.use: to invest in working capital and stock her grocery store with basic goods such as coffee, shampoo, rice, cooked beans, oil, soap, juice, soda, cookies, detergent, bread, and eggs.

loans.name: Emilse Isabel

texts.es:
Emilse es una mujer a la que le ha tocado ser madre y padre al mismo tiempo de dos gemelos de 14 años de edad. Hace 10 años se separó de su esposo y le tocó sacar adelante a su familia. “No ha sido fácil pero mis hijos me llenan de motivos para querer luchar cada día y poderles ofrecer lo mejor” con estas palabras Emilse nos cuenta  como ha sido la vida que le tocó vivir desde que no cuenta con el apoyo económico de su cónyuge. 

A pesar de la difícil situación por la que atravesó, logró sobreponerse y sacar el potencial innato que poseía para la elaboración de peinados y todo lo relacionado con el área de belleza. Su madre le prestó el dinero para montar su negocio y poder generar ingresos para el sostenimiento de su hogar. 
Hoy, su peluquería le ha permitido mejorar su calidad de vida y ofrecerles alimento, vestuario y educación a sus hijos. Aunque reconoce que su vida ha mejorado considerablemente, ella desea convertirse en una gran empresaria, y para ello se encuentra solicitando un crédito, que invertirá en la compra de una silla para cortes y productos de belleza, con el fin de ampliar su portafolio de productos y mejorar su servicio.
texts.en:
Emilse is a woman who has the responsibility of being both mother and father to her 14-year-old twins. Ten years ago, she separated from her husband and had to provide for her family alone. "It has not been easy, but my children fill me with the motivation to fight every day and to be able to offer them the best." With these words, Emilse tells us about the life she has lived since she has no financial support from her spouse.

Despite the difficult times she has been through, she managed to overcome her situation by drawing on her innate potential for hairdressing and everything related to the field of beauty. Her mother lent her the money to start her business in order to generate income and maintain her home. 

Today, her hair salon has allowed her to improve her quality of life and provide her children with food, clothing, and an education. Although she acknowledges that her life has improved considerably, she hopes to become a great entrepreneur. Therefore, she is applying for a loan to invest in the purchase of a chair for haircuts and beauty products, in order to expand her product portfolio and improve her services.

loans.use: To buy a chair for haircuts and beauty products.

loans.name: Ericka Patricia

texts.es: Ericka con su previo credikiva, compró Helados, dulces, refrigerios,y vendió un poco mas, así ha ido rotando su capital de trabajo y hoy tiene muchas aspiraciones de crecimiento  por eso aprovechará la temporada decembrina para invertir en mayor volumen, ganar descuentos y ofrecer a un buen precio sus productos. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a  Kiva, para hacer un nuevo financimiento, con el cual comprará helados, dulcería y refrescos, para hacer de su credito la mejor  inversión del año en este mes, época en la cual hay mucho dinero en circulación y sus ventas usualmente se incrementan, para que su credikiva sea todo un éxito.
texts.en: Ericka bought frozen treats and candy with her previous Kiva loan; her sales increased.  In this way she has been rotating her working capital and she has many aspirations for growth.  She wants to take advantage of the December season to invest in greater volume, get discounts, and offer her products at good prices.  This is the reason she has approached Kiva to get a new loan, with which she will buy ice cream, candy, and drinks to make good use of her loan this month.  This is the season when many people spend money and her sales usually increase, so her Kiva loan will be a success.

loans.use: to buy products in quantity.

loans.name: Responsabilidad Y Progreso Group

texts.es: La Sra. Nancy, es viuda y tiene 5 hijos de los cuales uno aún depende de ella. Tiene un año y medio con Edaprospo y se dedica a la venta de sandalias desde hace más de 5 años. Comenzó por motivación de uno de sus hijos, quien le inspiro a dedicarse a este negociopor ser rentable. Con su esfuerzo y trabajo, ha podido sacar adelante a todos sus hijos, dándole educación a cada uno de ellos. Actualmente su ingreso lo destina en la inversión de su negocio y a cubrir sus gastos familiares. Su plan para el futuro es expandir su negocio y remodelar su casa. Ella usó el crédito en la compra de mercadería para su negocio, ya que en esta temporada tiende a aumentar sus ventas. Nancy pertenece a la alcancía comunal “Responsabilidad y Progreso”, el cual tiene 1 año y medio desde que se formó y está conformado por 6 personas.
texts.en: Nancy is a widow with 5 dependent children.  She's been with EDAPROSPO for a year and a half, and she's had a business selling sandals for more than 5 years.  She was initially motivated by one of her children, who inspired her to devote herself to this business to make it profitable.  With her efforts and hard work, she's been able to provide for all of her children, giving each one of them an education.  Now, her income will be invested in her business and used to cover the household expenses.  For the future, Nancy plans to expand her business and remodel her house.  She will use the loan to buy merchandise for her business, because in this season she tends to increase her sales.  Nancy belongs to the communal bank "Responsibilidad y Progreso."  It's been a year and a half since it was formed, and the bank is comprised of 6 people.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Amigas De Tilata Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “AMIGAS DE TILATA”  iniciará el decimo tercer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Cascada, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Escarlet es la Secretaria. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de helados, tejido de ropa de bebe, tienda de llantas, tienda de barrio, venta de refrescos y gelatinas, carnicería, trenzado de mantas, venta de comida, venta de mantas de alpaca.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias con distintos rubros, donde la señora Escarlet es parte integrante, ella indica que hace seis meses que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una amiga que es socia de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de ropa, cuenta que hace años emprendió este negocio por concejos de una de sus tías, quienes viajaban por mercadería de ropa a otros departamentos.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de ropa) que adquirirá de Perú, por mayor, y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su hogar pues ella es soltera y tiene un hijo.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la confianza que reciben del personal.
texts.en:
